paper_abstract: A hypercomplex variant of Capon beamformer, called biquaternion Capon (BQ-Capon), is herein proposed for signal strengthening with four-component vector-sensor arrays. This BQ-Capon beamformer extracts the signal-of-interest (SOT) while rejecting interferences plus noise in a multiple-input-multiple-output (MIMO) fashion. Simulation results show that BQ-Capon beamformer outperforms the standard long-vector counterpart in convergence and sensitivity to mismatch in SOT steering vector.
paper_title: Biquaternion Capon beamformer using four-component vector-sensor arrays
